Uses of Interface
com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionRequest

  • Packages that use QuestionRequest 
    Package Description
    com.wiris.quizzes.api  

    • Uses of QuestionRequest in com.wiris.quizzes.api

      Methods in com.wiris.quizzes.api that return QuestionRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuestionRequest QuizzesBuilder.newEvalMultipleAnswersRequest(java.lang.String[] correctAnswers, java.lang.String[] studentAnswers, Question question, QuestionInstance instance)
      Deprecated. 
      Like QuizzesBuilder.newEvalRequest(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question, com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance) but this method allows to compare several student's answers with several correct answers.
      QuestionRequest QuizzesBuilder.newEvalRequest(java.lang.String correctAnswer, java.lang.String studentAnswer, Question question, QuestionInstance instance)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new QuestionRequest object suitable to send to the quizzes service in order to evaluate a student answer against a correct answer.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newFeaturedAssertionsRequest(Question question)
      Create a QuestionRequest that deduces the possible assertions for the correct answers of the question.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newFeaturedSyntaxAssertionsRequest(Question question)
      Create a QuestionRequest that deduces the possible syntax assertions for the correct answers of the question.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newFeedbackRequest(java.lang.String html, QuestionInstance instance)
      Create a QuestionRequest that evaluates the student answer(s) and gets the variables to be used in the feedback.
      QuestionRequest QuizzesBuilder.newFeedbackRequest(java.lang.String html, Question question, QuestionInstance instance)
      Deprecated. 
      Create a QuestionRequest that evaluates the student answer(s) and gets the variables to be used in the feedback.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newGradeRequest(QuestionInstance instance)
      Creates a new QuestionRequest object suitable to send to the quizzes service in order to evaluate a set of student answers against a set of correct answers using a defined criteria.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newMultipleAnswersGradeRequest(java.lang.String[] correctAnswers, java.lang.String[] studentAnswers)
      Like Quizzes.newSimpleGradeRequest(String, String) but this method allows to compare several student's answers with several correct answers using the default comparison criteria.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newSimpleGradeRequest(java.lang.String correctAnswer, java.lang.String studentAnswer)
      Creates a new QuestionRequest object suitable to send to the quizzes service in order to evaluate a student answer against a correct answer using the default criteria.
      QuestionRequest Quizzes.newVariablesRequest(java.lang.String html, QuestionInstance instance)
      Creates a new QuestionRequest object suitable to send to the quizzes service in order to get variable values generated from an algorithm.
      QuestionRequest QuizzesBuilder.newVariablesRequest(java.lang.String html, Question question, QuestionInstance instance)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new QuestionRequest object suitable to send to the quizzes service in order to get variable values generated from an algorithm.
      Methods in com.wiris.quizzes.api with parameters of type QuestionRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuestionResponse QuizzesService.execute(QuestionRequest request)
      Makes a remote call to Wiris Quizzes web service and returns its result.
      void QuizzesService.executeAsync(QuestionRequest request, QuizzesServiceListener listener)
      Makes an asynchronous remote call to Wiris Quizzes web service.
